channel.title: Comments on: An Easy Transformation
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Andy "SuperFly" Rundquist
item.dc:creator: Andy "SuperFly" Rundquist
item.description: Love this! I wonder how you could get students to do this outside of class (where the groups are harder to control).
item.content:encoded: Love this! I wonder how you could get students to do this outside of class (where the groups are harder to control).
